page.title: 02SHOPPING CENTRE N.LEEDS
page.content: SAINSBURY'S SHOPPING CENTRE The land used by Sainsbury's is l3 acres.The centre cost over Â£l0M to build.Employees work on average 4.5 days per week.The average wage of the 280 employees is Â£90. Sainsbury's in Leeds is one of the most successful stores in the country.Yearly profit is about 5% or Â£168M.The store receives about lO weekly complaints. Most customers like Sainsbury's.Shops around it are newsagents,hot food, key cutting and furniture. THE LIBRARY owns 67000 books(l-2 lost weekly) with l000 users.Â£250 in fines are paid weekly.It is the busiest library in Leeds; it caters for every age group. 20 librarians work there. THE PENNY FUN(pub) - uses 25 barrels of beer weekly, with 70 regulars. In l985 a pint of bitter costs 73p. 20 people work there.
